name: 2 Hands
description: If off-hand is empty; weapon deals 150% damage (else normal damage; or 75% if a second weapon is present)

name: Anti-Air (High Crit Rate)
description: Critical hits deal triple damage to floating targets instead of double (critical hit odds = 50%)

name: Dual-Wield
description: Weapon may be used in the shield hand alongside any other weapon but a spear (both will deal 75% damage)

name: MP for Criticals
description: If MP is sufficient (1/2 user's lv.); it is used for a guaranteed critical hit (plus additional benefits for rod spellcasts)

name: Throwable
description: Weapon is usable with the “Throw” command (critical damage; ignores defense/row)

name: Undead Slayer
description: Weapon randomly (50% odds) kills undead targets (if target is immune to death; then critical hit)

name: “Jump” Bonus
description: Spears do double damage when used with “Jump” (other weapons deal 150% fight *AND* random spell damage)

name: “May Cast (Spell)”
description: (Spell) is randomly cast on target in addition to regular damage (NOTE: spell damage is affected by user's row)

name: “May Counter-Attack”
description: User may counter any physical attack (rate is based on user's stamina – if stam >= 96; counter rate is 100%)

name: “May Guard Allies”
description: If in the front row; user may block physical attacks for back-row allies (if ally is near-fatal; will always guard)
